creditline: Gift of John Taylor and Rachel McNamara
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: sickle-shaped blade with handle; blade is rounded at end into C shape with two additional protruding points nearer handle on same side as blade; blade decorated with incised roughly parallel lines and curving lines made of tiny diagonal lines; wooden handle with three knobs at end; wide flat metal wire coiled around end of handle where it meets blade; blade has silver patina (rusted); dark brown handle
title: Blade
